title: WEDNESDAY - Ravens/Steelers matinee special 2020
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY - Ravens/Steelers matinee special 2020
description:
The Ravens and Steelers game (0:07) finally taking place this afternoon after a couple postponements. Baltimore getting several players back after being on the Reserve/COVID-19 list. Speaking of that list, the Broncos and Browns (1:02) also getting some good news when it comes to the return of players. The 49ers (1:13) heading to Arizona for 3 weeks after getting kicked out of their home, plus some potential good news when it comes to the future status of Jimmy Garoppolo (2:22). The NFC East still up for grabs, but Cowboys owner Jerry Jones gives his thoughts on who he thinks could win the division (2:48) and his answer might surprise you

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
